text:
The FAQ talks about how to submit an external task that you've written, but 
doesn't mention anything about writing an external task (or at least, I wasn't 
able to find it using the search terms that seemed logical to me).  It would 
be nice if there was a Q/A such as: 
 
Q: How do I create my own external Ant task? 
 
A: See the "Writing your own task" documentation at 
http://ant.apache.org/manual/develop.html.
creator: heiny@eznet.net
jkf@apache.org
text: Thanks for the suggestion, added a somewhat more elaborate FAQ entry.
